CatDescriptText: Robert LaMar, butcher, Mainway Supermarket, 2038 Centre Avenue, 1616 Broadhead Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1958, pg. 6 with question: "Do you believe the trouble in Middle East will start an atomic world war?" answer reads: "Yes, I believe the Middle East crisis will start an atomic war unless the United States and Russia reach a mutual agreement."
TitMainTitle: Robert LaMar wearing light colored shirt with Mainway Super Mart embroidered above breast pocket, light colored apron, moustache, and light colored hat for Armour franks, standing in front of coolers, possibly in Mainway Supermarket
